html: (3 Nephi 22:10)."For the mountains shall depart, and the hills be removed." The Lord's covenant with Israel will still be in place when mountains and hills that are now so prominent are gone; or, in other words, at the time the "earth [is] renewed and receive[s] its paradisiacal glory." (A of F 1:10.) Of this time, President Joseph Fielding Smith has written: "The earth is to be renewed or restored to its primitive beauty and condition, and when that day comes the high mountains which are seen today will be debased and the valleys exalted." (DS 2:316.)
